artist: Attributed to Giovanni Battista Ricci da Novara; Attributed to Cesare Nebbia; Formerly attributed to Agostino Ciampellli
description: mounted to sheet with gold, green and black borders; figure standing on platform with columns behind him; figures wears draping garment; standing figures at right and center in middle ground; other figures' torsos visible in lower corners; architectural elements in background center and upper right
medium: Pen and dark brown ink and wash on laid paper
title: Saint Paul Preaching in Athens
